What we loved: Big full kitchen, available laundry, 2 1/2 bath, able to park in the garage, lots of nice touches throughout, like soap, shampoo, a toothbrush if you forgot yours and other little amenities that were very thoughtful. The kitchen was stocked with all the basics. It was a quiet location not too far off of I75. There was also tons of closet space and hangers available to use.
Things that could use some improvement: the floors were not real clean, some towels were dusty, there was no window coverings in 2 bedrooms and the beds while very comfortable, were quite high.
Overall, I would recommend staying at this house. I would say it is not ideal for small children due to high beds, stairs and there were knives on the refrigerator. None of those were an issue for us but if you have very little children, those might not work for you.
